oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis and thermochemical study of ligand substitution reactions of aminobis(phosphines), Ph2P(R)NPPh2, with [Me2Pt(COD)]
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BALAKRISHNA, MS
PRIYA, SRINIVASAN
SOMMER, WILLIAM
NOLAN, STEVEN P
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: substitution reactions
thermochemistry
enthalpy
synthesis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The reactions of aminobis(phosphines), Ph2PN(R)PPh2 (R = H, Me, Et, nPr, nBu, Ph), with Me2Pt(COD) led to the formation of four-membered metallacycles in good yield. The enthalpies of the ligand substitution reactions are measured by the anaerobic solution calorimetry in THF at 30 Â°C.
